description: you want to draw attention where ever you go or want to drive a car rarely, if ever, seen on the road, then look at this:

1976 Avanti II, 400ci sbc, th400, Dana 44 rear w/3:31 gears, 103K miles, Corvette orange w/white leather interior, PS/PW/PB w/front disc/rear drums, AM/FM/Stereo/CD, AC just serviced with R134 and new high pressure hose, new NOS master cylinder, soft/hard brake lines, like new Pirelli P400 tires mounted on excellent Magnum 500 wheels. New front/rear sway bar bushings, new plugs/wires/coil/rotor. Solid hog troughs and rear cross member. Have build sheet showing all factory options.
Very dependable car that I would not hesitate to drive anywhere. Car is garage kept. 516-376-3471
title: 1976 Studebaker Avanti
